jwblangley.neat.genotype

Class NetworkGenotype

  • java.lang.Object
    • jwblangley.neat.genotype.NetworkGenotype
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ProtoEquivalent

    public class NetworkGenotype
extends java.lang.Object
implements ProtoEquivalent
    Genotype representing a neural network

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static double DIST_C1
      Constant for compatibility distance calculation weighting the relative importance of excess genes

      Constant for compatibility distance calculation weighting the relative importance of disjoint genes
      static double DIST_C3
      Constant for compatibility distance calculation weighting the relative importance of the average difference in weights of matching genes

      • addConnectionMutation

        public boolean addConnectionMutation(java.util.Random random,
                                     InnovationGenerator innovation,
                                     int maxAttempts)
        Create a new connection between two randomly chosen existing neurons without creating cycles
        Parameters:
        random - seeded Random object
        innovation - innovation marker generator
        maxAttempts - maximum number of attempts at selecting two random compatible neurons to connect
        Returns:
        whether the connection was successful

      • addNeuronMutation

        public void addNeuronMutation(java.util.Random random,
                              InnovationGenerator innovation)
        Splits a randomly chosen connection into two new connections, with a new neuron created between the two. The old connection is disabled. The first new connection has a weight of 1 and the second inherits the weight of the old connection
        Parameters:
        random - seeded Random object
        innovation - innovation marker generator

      • weightMutation

        public void weightMutation(java.util.Random random)
        Mutates the weights of every connection by perturbation or by assigning a new random weight
        Parameters:
        random - seeded Random object

      • crossover

        public static NetworkGenotype crossover(NetworkGenotype fittestParent,
                                        NetworkGenotype secondParent,
                                        java.util.Random random)
        Genes between the two parents are either matching (same innovation number), disjoint (doesn't have innovation number) or excess (outside the range of the the other parent's genes). When creating the child, matching genes (connections) are chosen at random from either parent. All excess or disjoint genes are always taken from the more fit parent only.
        Parameters:
        fittestParent - the 'fitter' parent
        secondParent - the second parent
        random - seeded Random object
        Returns:
        resulting genotype

      • compatibilityDistance

        public static double compatibilityDistance(NetworkGenotype first,
                                           NetworkGenotype second)
        Calculate how 'similar' two network genotypes are with the calculation: delta = (c_1 * E / N) + (c_2 * D / N) + c_3 * W_bar
        Parameters:
        first - first NetworkGenotype
        second - second NetworkGenotype
        Returns:
        compatibility distance between the two - greater compatibility implies greater difference between the two genotypes

      • circularIfConnected

        public boolean circularIfConnected(NeuronGenotype additionalFrom,
                                   NeuronGenotype additionalTo)
        Checks whether adding a connection will cause cycles
        Parameters:
        additionalFrom - the uid of the neuron which the additional connection would be from
        additionalTo - the uid of the neuron which the additional connection would be to
        Returns:
        whether the additional connection would create cycles
